attributes.title: MY GOD THIS IS TERRIBLE
attributes.review: So i downloaded this app bc it said free mcdonald’s then when it finished downloading it said free candy then my pet dinosaur said want some taco bell then i said no i want wendy’s then we went to chic fla then got our whoppers then went home i’m horrified by this app

attributes.title: Glitchy
attributes.review: The app is so glitchy and so much is wrong like the photos. I saw a Cheeto puff with ramen noodle hair working out. Then to see that he want us to vote for him? He is just so irrelevant and irritating. Like I though he died? But we are counting on the simpsons ✨👑❤️🧚🏾💅🏽

attributes.title: horrible .
attributes.review: this app is horrible . i didn’t get any updates about stuff . so much ads and it always glitches and you see a cheeto working out . what kind of app is this . horrible don’t ever get this . THIS IS TRASHHH .

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: I myself am a republican. I came on here to hear the lovely news of our hero, President Donald J. Trump and to discuss the war criminal, Joe Biden and all of those snowflakes. When I came on here, I was SHOCKED to see that Mr. Donald Trump has been PHOTOSHOPPING his photos to look like Kim Kardashian West! Photoshopping is a low blow, Mr. President. A very low blow indeed.

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: First of all awful awful many many things are wrong with it like just the name TRUMp is awful and I hated it it should be dleated the fact it’s still here is actually sad🤮 like get rid of it plz it’s AWFUL

attributes.title: My opinion on this app
attributes.review: First I thought this was an app for grownups but then I opened and I saw a fat pig and it was scary too, Second I showed the fat pig to my little sister and she started crying and she normally doesn’t cry at pigs, Lastly I don’t support orange people with a wig on. PERIOD💅

attributes.title: Do not
attributes.review: This app should get deleted the pictures and videos were not available and it took my information don’t get it.

attributes.title: Just no
attributes.review: This app crashed my whole house. Do not download. Alexa started screaming all countries matter and she wouldn’t say merry Christmas. A gator rang my doorbell and when I opened it he coughed in me. Now o can’t smell anything and Orange water was leaking every where.

attributes.title: BLM ✊✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.review:
This app is anti human rights and anti equality 🤢 the man that is frequently shown on this app looks disgusting and is a disgrace. This app also says that all the news we see is fake but honestly that’s the only fake news I see. 
This man needs to go DOWN

attributes.title: Absolutely makes no sense
attributes.review: This app is horrible! It makes no sense!! I wouldn’t recommend at all. I would rate it 0 if I could. I can’t believe Apple allows this sort of thing on their site. 🤮🤮
